key_points.point: Good sound quality for the price
Sound quality is flat compared to other brands

verdict: Sound quality is generally considered good for the price, with emphasis on the bass. However, some users find it flat or cheap.

key_points.point: Conflicting reports about noise cancellation effectiveness
lot of sound coming from outside this is not noice cancellation
good noise cancellation capabilities at high volume

verdict: Opinions on noise cancellation are mixed, with some users praising it and others finding it ineffective. There are also mentions of noise isolation.

key_points.point: Experience ear pain during longer sessions

verdict: Comfort is subjective; some users find the headphones comfortable, while others experience discomfort, especially during long sessions or if they have larger ears.
Battery life is generally praised as being long and satisfactory.
Connectivity is generally positive, with dual connectivity being appreciated. However, there are some reports of Bluetooth disconnection issues.
